item.title: Innovative Advanced Control of Large Cryogenic Systems
item.description:
The ANR CRYOGREEN project gathers collaborative academic and industrial partners, including GIPSA-lab, CEA and CERN. We target to advanced control of large cryogenic systems via explicit nonlinear and hierarchical distributed model predictive control frameworks. Cryogenic Plants at CEA and CERN Explicit Constrained Control of Warm Compression Stations Process configuration and dynamic simulator
Allocation control and validation results
Hierarchical Constrained Control of Cryogenic Refrigerators
